Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024
Author: Meow Mama
Title: Yes, it’s worth it!
Body: I have wanted a Stanley for a while but thought it was just more of a trend than anything else so I have hesitated spending the money on it. I finally decided to treat myself and see what all the hype was about. Oh wow, I get it now! This tumbler is amazing! I love it so much! I did a test where I put crushed ice, not cubed, filled it only halfway with ice and then the water. I timed how long the ice lasted and it was almost 40 hours later and the ice was finally gone! I swear this tumbler is the only way I can drink plain water, as it just tastes better in my Stanley. Maybe it’s a psychological thing but it’s worth it to me. I haven’t had issues with leaking, I use the straw through the straw holder part. The handle is perfect for my small hands, and it has the nice smooth grip. It’s easy to hold and it fits perfectly in my cup holders! I’m so glad I got this tumbler! Trust me, it’s worth the price! I also was pleased to see it was delivered wrapped in plastic and paper and arrived in perfect condition. If you’re on the fence about getting a Stanley tumbler like I was, just get it! It’s 100% worth it!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2024
Author: Becca
Title: It’s my favorite water bottle
Body: I like it. The insulation is great. The handle is useful. It leaks even when it’s supposed to be completely sealed. And I can’t put water bottle stickers on it. They just peel right off😭But overall, It’s a great cup and it’s worth the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024
Author: T CavazosT Cavazos
Title: Not my favorite Stanley
Body: This isn’t my favorite Stanley but I know it’s the most popular. I need something that won’t spill and even when you twist the straw lid to close, it still drips out which I don’t love. I’m usually very careful but I want the peace of mind that if it does tip over, I won’t have a huge mess to clean up. Don’t get me wrong, I understand the hype and it’s cute but it’s not as practical as I’d like it to be. I do like that the handle is better IMO over the Yeti. It’s not as bulky and the insulation keeps the drink about as cold as Yetis.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2024
Author: Sangeetha
Title: Terrible. Do not buy it.
Body: Such a terrible product for the premium price they charge. Got 2.0 30 oz and it leaks like hell. Never expected for price they charge. Now I have to get a leak proof set sold in Amazon to fix the leak. This is just a Instagram influenced sake but nothing great about the product at all.  highly recommend not to buy this at all. I want to give 0 star but as I m unable to do it I give it a 1 star.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2024
Author: Emely MEmely M
Title: Damaged
Body: This is the first Stanley cup I buy, I got it because I’ve heard so many great things about it. As excited as I was to get it, when I went to open it from the box, I noticed it was damaged. There’s a scratch and paint chipped on the upper left side. In the front where the logo is. If it was in the back I wouldn’t have minded as much but it’s in the front. Other than that the color is great, I love it. I wish I can get a replacement. Since I bought it new it should not be damaged at all.

Author: annaanna
Title: I have become a Stanley girl
Body: I bought two Stanleys (this one and another color) for my boyfriend and I a few weeks ago. Not a day has passed where we haven't drank out of them! It has become my new favorite way to drink water, as it keeps it ice cold all day! This color is also quite cute and I'm a big fan of the handle and straw. Its super easy to clean too! I just put the individual compartments in the dishwasher :)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2024
Author: PEC
Title: Beautiful & Well Made Cup
Body: The Rose Quartz is gorgeous in person. It’s like a cross between beige and light pink. If you enjoy pinks and neutral tones, this will be a nice addition to your collection. Definitely a must-have for anyone that likes to match their cup to their outfit and this color being soo popular now. I love that these cups can go in the dishwasher, bc handwashing just isn’t it. Keeps my drinks icy cold days. So many cute, versatile accessories available. Amazon has a better price on these than the Stanley1913 site, along with major other competitors. The cup itself is very durable and heavy duty, but not heavy. I pair a bent 30-40oz white or pink silicone straw with my cups. I had a friend that cracked a tooth drinking from a metal straw while driving. You always want to give your kids silicone straws, too. The 30oz capacity is perfect for anyone going all-day and should see you through your work day. While I have a 40oz, I feel like the 30 is less bulky and takes up less room in my car and in my workspace. Don’t get me wrong tho, I love my 40s, too!! I think it’s great to have an assortment for your drink needs depending on what you’re doing that day. :)

Date: Starter Plan or higher is required in order to access reviews beyond 100.
